H0.text: where do secondary xylem and phloem cells arise from. The apical meristem

H1.text: where do secondary xylem and phloem cells arise from. The root cap

H2.text: where do secondary xylem and phloem cells arise from. The procambium

H3.text: where do secondary xylem and phloem cells arise from. The vascular cambium

A4.text: The vascular cambium produces secondary xylem on the inside of the ring, and secondary phloem on the outside
